item.title: Paradise is where I go to sleep
item.description: “Sleep is the best meditation.” — Dalai Lama There are few things in life I enjoy more than sleep.

item.title: The secret to everlasting happiness
item.description: Meaningful and purpose-driven work is the secret to everlasting happiness. That’s it.
